member.summary: Describes how the program usage is to be displayed.

member.name: F:ConsoleFx.CmdLine.Program.HelpBuilders.UsageType.Summary
member.summary: The program usage is to be displayed as a summary, showing just the existence of subcommands, arguments and options, but not mentioning them in detail.

member.name: F:ConsoleFx.CmdLine.Program.HelpBuilders.UsageType.Detailed
member.summary: The program usage is to be displayed in detail, with every argument and option combinations mentioned.
